categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Schor was a male Human Private of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum he traveled to Odessen and joined the Alliance. He was assigned to the military branch of the Alliance under Bey'wan Aygo, where he frequently clashed with former Republic Corporal Asani over their former affiliations. He was present on the planet Umbara during the Crisis on Umbara. He was considered a good shot by his colleagues.
Private Schor first appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the Alliance base on Odessen.
